name: Yatzy
description: Yatzy is the popular dice game played in a variety of ways all over the world.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: XP Processor: Intel Single Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 2004 GPU Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 Processor: Intel Single Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2004 GPU Storage: 400 MB available space
